targets.expr: sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container!="", pod!~"thanos-query-frontend.+", pod=~"thanos-query.+"}[$__interval]))

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod!~"thanos-query-frontend.+", pod=~"$job.+", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod!~"thanos-query-frontend.+", pod=~"$job.+",}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, container)
kube_horizontalpodautoscaler_status_current_replicas{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", horizontalpodautoscaler="thanos-query"}
kube_horizontalpodautoscaler_spec_max_replicas{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", horizontalpodautoscaler="thanos-query"}
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", container="query"}) by (pod)
sum by (pod) (rate(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="query", pod=~"$job.+"}[1m]))
kube_pod_container_status_terminated_reason{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$job.+"}

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query for the given time.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job="$job", handler="query",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job="$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query_range for the given time range.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query_range.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query_range",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from other queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from other queriers, in quantiles

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of DNS lookups to discover stores.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_query_store_apis_dns_lookups_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of failures compared to the total number of executed DNS lookups.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_query_store_apis_dns_failures_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_query_store_apis_dns_lookups_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows available capacity of processing queries in parallel.

targets.expr: max_over_time(thanos_query_concurrent_gate_queries_max{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]) - avg_over_time(thanos_query_concurrent_gate_queries_in_flight{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Concurrent Capacity

targets.expr: go_memstats_alloc_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",job=~"$job"}
rate(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",job=~"$job"}[30s])
rate(go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",job=~"$job"}[30s])
go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",job=~"$job"}
go_goroutines{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"$job"}
go_gc_duration_seconds{environment="$environment", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace",job=~"$job"}
